LanguageData.NAT_InducerObeliskLetter: The obelisk is activating! It swells with grisly energy as the air crackles around it. It is about to self-destruct in a great explosion, but before it does, it will create pulses, inducing rage and twisting minds.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerTriggered_Desc: While interacting with the obelisk, {PAWN_nameDef} felt psychic weaves induced from it.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Animals: Local animals become hostile after obelisk pulse.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Subdue: Obelisk took control on {PAWN_nameDef}'s mind. {PAWN_pronoun} will attack your colonists and your allies.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Shock: Obelisk pulse induced void shock on {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} will be in this condition for around a day.
LanguageData.NAT_InducerEffectDesc_Suppression: Obelisk pulse mentally supressed {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} will feel this wave of anxiety and anger for some time.
LanguageData.NAT_ObeliskCausedBreak: This happened because of crannied obelisk psy-pulse.
LanguageData.NAT_SkullArrival_Desc: Transport pod crashed nearby. Inside it you've found {PAWN_nameDef}'s skull.
LanguageData.NAT_OrderPawnToOpen: Order pawn to open warped cage
LanguageData.NAT_LetterPawnStealed: {PAWN_nameDef} was stealed by collector. Now {PAWN_pronoun} is in his lair somewhere nearby.\n\nFind and kill colector to save {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.NAT_LetterGoldenCubeStealed: You've found out that golden cube, beautiful Cube, was stealed.\n\nMaybe cube was stealed by collector, creature that steals everything valuable.
LanguageData.NAT_CollectorLairFound_Desc: You have designate location of collector's lair. It seems to be in {0}.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_NoGroups: A group of rusts walked in the region nearby.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmySiege_Desc: A group of rusts has dropped from the orbit nearby.\n\nThey will stay there until someone would provoke them.
LanguageData.NAT_VoidSiege: \n\nSiege will try to stop anyone from activating void structures.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Groups: {0} groups of rusted soldiers walked in the region nearby.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Stage: They will prepare before attack for some time.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_Mass: They are led by rusted mass.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedArmyRaid_VoidDefence_Desc: A group of rusted soldiers arrived to defend void structure!\nThey will attack anyone who would enter area nera the structure.
LanguageData.NAT_DropTroopers_Desc: Request group of rusted stormtroopers, that will land in specific place? crushing enemies beneath.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedShieldTip: Rusted armor protects from any damage but can be destroyed.
LanguageData.NAT_RustedSphereDeactivateMissingShards: To deactivate rusted mass you need {0} shards!
LanguageData.NAT_RustedMassArrival_Desc: Nearby crashed strange rusted piece of bioferrite, filling with dangerous energy.\n\nSend someone to capture and study it
LanguageData.NAT_PainTransform_Desc:
Things nearby turned into clotted pain!

Be careful clotted pain can create pain field that will induce pain to your colonists.

Use pain inhibitor to prevent clotted pain from random appearing.
LanguageData.NAT_RustResurrected_Desc: {0} gained enough bioferrite to resurrect {1} in it's regular form.
LanguageData.NAT_DestroyCoreConfirmation:
Destroying this core would kill {0} forever.

{0} is colony controlled {1}.

Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_NameDraft: Display rusted soldier name while drafted
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_NameDraft_Desc: Display rusted soldier name while drafted.\n\nWill only affect player controlled soldiers.
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_NameNoDraft: Display rusted soldier name while undrafted
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_NameNoDraft_Desc: Display rusted soldier name while undrafted.\n\nWill only affect player controlled soldiers.
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_WeaponChange_Desc: Allow to change rusted soldier weapon.\n\nWill only affect player controlled soldiers.
LanguageData.NAT_Setting_AllowRaid_Desc: Allow extra features in void awakening game ending.
LanguageData.NAT_CreateRustCompleteText_Fail: {INVOKER_nameDef} has completed {RITUAL_definite} ritual, but nothing happened.\n\nSome bioferrite was lost.
